TopicTitle: White sun in space Yellow sun on the surface.

Articles.Content: IRL Our sun is White if we go into space it only looks yellow because of our atmosphere, I thought this should be in the game. Inside kerbin's atmosphere The sun will appear yellow but going into space it will turn white. now I thought about maybe if in Eve's atmosphere the sun could be like a different color Or something like that.
That sounds cool. I would definetly like to see this. Would make the planets more unique and add to the feeling of exploring another world
That's an amazing idea i hope they consider that in .26
